visual.name: ZebraBITables
visual.description: Stunning tables with charts. Perfect for sales or cost variance reporting, income statements, ...

dataRoles.description: Add a measure here to chart actual data. You can drag up to 20 additional measures here to display them in the table.
dataRoles.name: Values

dataRoles.description: Add a measure for previous year (PY) here to create variance charts vs. previous year.
dataRoles.name: PreviousYear

dataRoles.description: Add a measure for plan or budget here to create variance charts vs. plan.
dataRoles.name: Plan

dataRoles.description: Add a measure for forecast or estimation here to display forecasts or estimations.
dataRoles.name: Forecast

suppressAbsoluteVariances.description: Suppress absolute variances when one of the elements is null

suppressLargeRelativeVarianceValue.displayName: Suppress large relative variance value in %

decimalPlaces.description: Select the number of decimal places to display

decimalPlacesPercentage.description: Select the number of percentage decimal places to display

topNOtherLabel.description: Name the 'Others' category when using Top/Bottom N. Right-click on the category names directly in the visual to set up Top/Bottom N.

legendHeaderSettings.description: Column headers settings. Click the down arrow in the column header (⯆) directly on the visual to rename each individual column.

designSettings.description: Choose your style or switch to Custom to set fill, line, marker, axis and gridline colors

interactionSettings.description: Enable/disable interactive features in view mode (for end-users)
